channel.title: G! Turbo [4/7-Infinite] - Hosting Tomorrow at 9-10pm BST
channel.description:
### Gameplay
Days will be 15 minutes long. Nights will be 5 minutes long.
### Executions
To accuse someone say **/vote [player]** This game will have Majority and Plurality
### Logs
Anyone may leave logs if they wish
### To Join
To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, coach” or whatever you want
### Rolelist:
Rolelist is hidden until the start of the game. It will always include a **King** but can include more. :^)
# Playerlist
1. Marshal 2. KyoDaz 3. Clonedcheese 4. Italy 5. 6. 7.
# Game ideally starts [date=2020-04-29 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"]

item.title: G! Turbo [4/7-Infinite] - Hosting Tomorrow at 9-10pm BST
item.dc:creator: Wazza
item.description:
Summary

Roll a number from 1 - Number of classes.
Always roll a King.
Re-Roll any classes you find will just be stressing or unfun for a turbo.
Roll who will get what class
Establish Town Factions can win together.

It’s hard to explain how to roll it tbh.

Read full topic
